shinycoreci 0.0.0.9005
  • Reference

    Test deployed apps

    test_in_deployed.Rd

    Automatically runs the next app in a fresh callr::r_bg session. To stop, close the shiny application window.

    test_in_connect(
  app_name = apps[1],
  apps = apps_manual,
  ...,
  urls = default_connect_urls,
  server = attr(urls, "server"),
  account = attr(urls, "account"),
  port = 8080,
  host = "127.0.0.1"
)

test_in_shinyappsio(
  app_name = apps[1],
  apps = apps_manual,
  port = 8080,
  host = "127.0.0.1",
  account = "testing-apps",
  server = "shinyapps.io"
)

    Arguments

    app_name

    app number or name to start with. If numeric, it will match the leading number in the testing application

    apps

    List of apps to test

    ...

    ignored

    urls

    Named vector of urls to visit. This should be the output of [connect_urls]. By default this will set server, account, dir, and apps

    server, account

    Parameters that could be supplied to [rsconnect::deployApp]

    port

    port for the foreground app process

    host

    host for the foreground app processes

    Functions

    • test_in_connect: Test connect applications given the server and account

    • test_in_shinyappsio: Test connect applications given the server and account

    Examples

    if (FALSE) test_in_connect(dir = "apps")
if (FALSE) test_in_test_in_shinyapps_io(dir = "apps")

    Contents
